website_summaries.verdict: This attractive steamer pot set is durable, easy to clean, with an outer pot made of heavy-duty aluminum that retains heat and a stainless-steel steamer insert.
pros: Both the outer pot and the steamer insert have easy-to-grasp rubberized handles that stay cool during use
A hard enameled exterior and nonstick interior coating make the base pot easy to clean, while the steamer insert is made of polished stainless steel
It's also oven-safe up to 400º F
cons: This set is neither dishwasher-safe nor compatible with induction cook tops

customer_reviews.title: Cleans up beautifully
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, nice size. First time I used it I boiled the water dry (got distracted with something else), and only realized it when I smelled something burning! The inside of the pan was black and charred - thought for sure I had ruined my brand new pan. But NO, it cleaned up so easily and I can't even tell that I almost ruined it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was bigger
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean , cooks great and fast , wish it was bigger , it’s very small
customer_reviews.author: Madlen Dye

customer_reviews.title: Great for 1-3 people
customer_reviews.text: Came with a slight chemical smell but one good wash took care of that. Handles do not get very hot so no hot hands needed. Nice size for 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: LOVEEE IT. i bought the red one too. Small enough to steam quick appetizers/dishes and the pot itself is small enough to cook up a quick soup for 2-3 people. Would definitely order it again. I wish i had more money i’d buy more just to give them out for christmas.
customer_reviews.author: AubreyLLA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect even the second time
customer_reviews.text: I had one and almost wore it out. I love this steamer. I use it almost daily as I eat a lot of steamed veggies. It is easy to store too. Beautiful color.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia B.

customer_reviews.title: Cute little steamer perfect for one person
customer_reviews.text: It is much smaller than regular steamers- which is exactly what I need. Very beautiful, fine design, small but deep, heats quickly, and the nonstick features work pretty well so far. The only downside I have noticed so far is the edge of the pot is quite sharp, it is possible to scrape my hands or arms if I am not careful enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Cleaning and a Great Size!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this steamer. I am eating more and more vegetables and I got tired of boiling them and having them come out full of water. It is the perfect size to make several portions. Easy cleaning by hand. I have other Rachael Ray cookware which I also love and this steamer does not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: msewbusy

customer_reviews.title: recommend from friend
customer_reviews.text: The steaming pot has been received. It's finally used today. You can write a comment. Baby has two layers, each of which is steamed very well. At first, I was worried that such a low price would lead to unsealed running and steaming, but I was worried in vain. Every layer is steamed very well. Each layer can steamed eight to twelve steamed buns, a pot of family can eat for two or three days, now the weather is cold, it is very easy to do. Very satisfied, well received
customer_reviews.author: whwrx

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend to a Friend
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these pots. I had no idea what I was looking for when I set out to make baby food and I took a stab in the dark and ordered these. They are super cute and easy to store. I accidentally scorched the bottom of them and was able to clean it up very easily. I would recommend again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Aversman

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: I don't care much for TV chefs. I take Anthony Bourdain's viewpoint and think they are frauds. But after having 3 pretty bad steamers, this one fills the bill. The basket does not go almost all the way down to the water line and does not boil over. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Z.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This works like a charm. It's not a large steamer but it works perfectly for what I need it for. It's very easy to clean and I love using it. It's much more hygenic to use that a steamer that you plug in bc those can become molded quickly. I'm super happy with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Destiny & Luis

customer_reviews.title: ... I needed a steamer pot and this one is awesome highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have all magnalite pots but I needed a steamer pot and this one is awesome highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Rita Sittig

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Th circle is not even , therefore it doesn't close right .. very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: boualem Lalioui

customer_reviews.title: Not stick surface does not hold up
customer_reviews.text: I like size and function of the steamer. However I didn’t know before I ordered that is was not stick Teflon. The non stick began to fade and come off soon after I bought. It just does not hold up to the constant boiling of a steamer. I am worried about the health safety
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Hixson

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected but fantastic quality.
customer_reviews.text: Love Rachel ray brand. I've had the pan set for 5 years and they are still in perfect shape. Pot is a little smaller than expected. Perfect for sides or meals for 1 or 2 people. I purchased for veggie steaming and cooking potatoes. Perfect for doing just that.
customer_reviews.author: Japauley

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful and it is the most perfect steamer and cleans very easily. The color is absolutely gorgeous. Very well made and durable will last me years I love all her products
customer_reviews.author: samantha murphree

customer_reviews.title: Terrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in this product. It was shipped in an oversized amazon box, not an original product box. Maybe it doesn’t usually come in one, but this allowed for the pot to shift in transit. The cardboard insert ripped in two. The pot had slid out of its plastic packaging and there are visible scratches/dents on the exterior of the bottom pot. It also appears to be somewhat misshapen which allows the top pot to move about when placed into the bottom pot. I expected more for the price and coming from a well-known company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Steaming with style
customer_reviews.text: Love this dual use steamer pot. Constantly using it for asparagus. Highly suggest hand washing as I prefer these lasting looking as good as they do now.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Henderson

customer_reviews.title: BEST pot in my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I love this pot, just the right size. GREAT for steaming veggie!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Great pan
customer_reviews.text: Living by myself, I was looking for something like a stock pot or dutch oven, but smaller. This pan fit the bill. The clean up is super easy and it's very versatile. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Linda K.

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: The product is very nice and is what I expected it to be from the photo. The quality is good. The size is what I expected. So I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Yiu wai fun

customer_reviews.title: Great steamer
customer_reviews.text: I had never had the steaming attachment but this one is great size. The pan is even great on it own. And the color is great!

customer_reviews.text: For some reason I've found it challenging to find a good steamer. This one works fine. It's a good size, is attractive and cleans easily.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!

customer_reviews.title: Dont even bother buying this junk
customer_reviews.text: This is a complete waste of money! I had to get a replacement because the first one was so messed up and the second one was even worse. Dont waste your time even considering this product!

customer_reviews.title: Horrendous quality! Garbage!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst quality cookware I have ever seen! My sister got a casserole dish for Christmas and the lid did not fit. But it was pretty and I assumed an isolated incident. I bought this and total total garbage! The lid didnt fit and the steamer didnt fit so when you use them together you get a rickety mess that keeps sliding off. Cant use the steamer at all! What a , it is very pretty. But the last time I buy Rachel Ray anything!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this pot! My old steamer pot somehow got bent and I needed a new one. As a family of two and a half, this is the perfect size. You can easily fit an entire head of broccoli in the basket. It is a little bulky in the cabinet as the basket sits kind of high on the pot, but it doesn't bother me much since the quality is great. The color is accurate to the picture.
customer_reviews.author: M&J E.

customer_reviews.title: Nice steaming pot with a modern color.
customer_reviews.text: Nice steaming pot ! I used it already a couple of times for steaming veggies for my selfmade baby puree. Can't complain about this item, does the job. What I like about it too is, that you can also use it as as regulated pot without the steaming part. Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Steamer Not A Double Boiler
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a double boiler and my husband thought he be nice and order me one. He searched the terms found one in red and ordered it. This is a great steamer. Its on the smaller side, but works well. It however it not a double boiler so shouldn't come up when you search for one. The pot does scratch a bit easily. I already have one scratch after one use and wash I am not sure how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Ceballos

customer_reviews.title: Best steamer ever!
customer_reviews.text: I just love the steamer. Perfect size and steams everything just right! I had been using a plastic steamer in the microwave and found that the food had a unpleasant taste after steaming. I noticed an immediate difference in the fresh taste of veggies when using this steamer. I even bought one as a gift for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: One of my most used pots
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my second one on Amazon like new for 28. I literally use this steam pot almost daily. Perfect for hard boil eggs, steaming vegetables. The pot alone is perfect for boiling chicken, pasta etc. Very easy to clean. I love it and it matches the rest of my pot set.
customer_reviews.author: The PeanutTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Versatile & well-made,
customer_reviews.text: I love the size, the quality, the easy-grip & temp. safe handles, the color options, and the amount of water that can be used for the steamer insert. No more worries of running your pot dry while you're trying to steam your food! I love this pot and even my husband, who remarks on very little, loves this set! He thinks it's beautiful too.
customer_reviews.author: byrdelady

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: I've used the pot with and without the steamer, and I have no complaints. Plus, the red color is just cute.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B.

customer_reviews.title: Made tamales in this
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a small steamer to Occasionally make tamales. This one did the trick. I love the hue of blue as well. Only downside is that it’s hard to get anything that melts into the steamer basket like cheese off of it.

customer_reviews.title: Replaced an earlier dutch version

product_meta.title: Rachael Ray Cucina Nonstick Sauce Pot/Saucepot with Steamer Insert and Lid, 3 Quart, Cranberry Red
product_meta.description: Size:3 Quart| Color:Cranberry RedSteam your way to meal time success with this multipurpose steamer set. Vegetables, dumplings and tamales steam to perfection in no time and the steamer insert makes it a cinch to boil and strain pasta for a delicious spaghetti dinner. The saucepot is perfect on its own for making stews, soups, and sauces, too. High-quality nonstick for easy food release and fast cleanup. Oven safe to 350°F.
feature_bullets: CONVENIENT MULTI POT: Make soups and stews with this nonstick saucepot or add the steamer basket for seafood, pasta, or corn on the cob
MADE TO LAST: Durable aluminum saucepot with steam basket heats quickly and evenly for convenient cooking
EASY DOES IT: Long-lasting nonstick easily releases foods for stovetop convenience and fast cleanup
GET A GRIP: Grippy handles are comfortable to grasp and double riveted for extra strength when using the steamer set as a pasta pot or lobster pot
OVEN LOVIN': Oven safe to 350°F, this saucepot and steamer combo is a great addition for versatility in your kitchen
SET INCLUDES: 3-Quart Saucepot, Stainless Steel Steamer Insert and Lid

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars492 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
